Summary: bright starlike object blue, red and white lites
divs: Sighting DetailsI watched the object in the southwestern sky on one occasion and last night it was in the western sky. It is oblong in shape and twinkles like a star would but with bursts of blue and red. Very big bursts and at one point it looked like it opened up with all these lights inside. I was looking thru bonoculars. It never moved it just stayed in one spot. I know it wasnt a plane or helicopter. I was just on my front porch enjoying a cigarette and this object attracted my attention. I called my husband to look as he is a twilight zone watcher to see what he thought. He was not very interested. But he just blew my off oh its this or that. Everntually it got late and I couldnt see it anymore because it went be hind acloud.
